item.title: Where Did Everyone Go? Potential of Digital Movement Data for Natural Hazards Management
item.description: Taking the 2017 earthquake as a case study, recent work by our team at the Global Facility for Disaster Reduction and Recovery (GFDRR)/ World Bank is uncovering valuable applications for this digital movement data and building open-source tools to bring these methods into the mainstream of disaster risk management.

item.title: Assessing Social Inequality and Lockdown Policies using Mobile Location Data in Indonesia
item.description: Challenge Lockdown policies such as stay-at-home orders and non-essential business closures are central to fighting the novel coronavirus. However, policy makers are having a hard time answering key questions about their efficacy.
